instructions:
Remove skin from thighs, rinse and pat dry. Combine chicken soup, chili sauce, taco seasoning and hot
sauce. Add and mix water until it has the consistency of a thin batter and set aside. Dust chicken thighs with
seasoned flour, dip in the soup mixture and roll in the nacho chips. Place on a rack in a baking dish and
drizzle with the melted butter. Place in a 400 F oven for 25 minutes, then reduce oven to 350 F and continue
roasting for 15 minutes. May be frozen.
If frozen, thaw and heat at 350 F for 30 minutes wrapped in foil, then unwrap and heat at 425 F for 7
minutes.
ingredients: 1/3 can (10 1/2 oz) Campbell's cream of chicken soup
1 cup crushed nacho flavored corn chips
name: Mexican Chicken
